DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess consumers' behaviors related to gabapentin self- selection and use, relative to warnings and directions for use, as described in the proposed over-the-counter (OTC) product label.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial to Assess Consumer Self-Selection and Use of Gabapentin for Occasional Sleeplessness in an Over-the-Counter Environment
DOC.criteria: Age of 18 years or older with symptoms of sleeplessness Provided informed consent Contraindications to use of gabapentin
